description: Allows adding multiple tags to a container or containers.  If no container(s) are provided then the current container is assumed.

inputs.description: A mandatory list of tag strings
inputs.name: tag_list

inputs.description: An optional ID of another container
inputs.name: container_id

inputs.description: An optional list of container IDs
inputs.name: container_list

outputs.description: The result of the custom function -success or failure
Result message from the custom function
